text:
Back to this – after extensive testing in other portals

In child themes I can hide modules that are only in the child theme – not module overrides from the parent theme or modules in the parent theme

None of this works with any kind of sections
cc <@U7SL518D6>
Interesting! thanks for the update on this <@U3T21PDBK>
Update: if I include both the relative path AND the full parent theme path then it hides the button module as expected
still can’t get sections to workl
It would be great if that would be mentioned in the Documentation :slightly_smiling_face:
I think this unexpected behavior is more buggy than anything regarding docs. And I still can’t get sections to hide
have you tried the same with sections as with "/parent_theme/modules/buttons" ? basically hiding the section from the parent theme?
